name: Dimensions Clinic
description: We are located at the Castro Mission Health Center. We serve youth ages 12-24, from San Francisco and the bay area. Dimensions Clinic is a welcoming, safe and open space for LGBTQ+ youth to get comprehensive medical and mental health services. We offer free or low-cost healthcare for youth. Services we offer: - Primary care - Sexual healthcare (including STI screening, birth control, HIV treatment and prevention) - Therapy - Psychiatry - Support with navigating health insurance
